## rxSelect variable

Exposes a memoized selector function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
rxSelect: <T, R>(aSelector: UnaryFunction<T, R>, aCmp?: EqualsPredicate<R>) => OperatorFunction<T, R>
```
